text: Lords of Black is the debut album by the Spanish power metal band Lords of Black , released on May 9, 2014, under their own independent record label. == Track listing == == Personnel == *Ronnie Romero – Lead vocals *Tony Hernando - Guitars, bass, additional Keyboards, synths and narrated voices. *Andy C. (Andres Cobos) - Drums, piano == Production == *Tony Hernando - Production *Anti Horrillo and Dani Ballesteros - Recording engineers *Roland Grapow - Co- Production, recording, mixing and mastering *Felipe Machado Franco - Cover Art == References == == External links == *Discogs.com *Metallum Archvies Category: 2014 debut albums Category:Lords of Black albums
title: Lords of Black (album)
